entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
